Jogo desafiar de vez em quando, é muito bom pra você que deseja passar o tempo com alguns desafios.
 Não muito complicado, mas pode lhe dar um pouco de dor de cabeça as vezes, mas com o tempo vai pegando a manha.
 Sem dúvidas é um excelente investimento, ainda mais quando comprado em promoção.
buen juego

Welcome to Aperture Science. I will now tell you my experience after the multiple tests I have taken.

(Okay time for the actual review.) 

Portal is a game set in a semi-abandoned science lab which a robot named GLaDOS guides you through test chambers. You then get a portal gun which you can shoot two colored portals that you can go through that you normally could not. The game progressively gets darker as you go through. Such as text scribbled on walls by a mysterious person and strange and disturbing images flashing on the monitors in the boss fight. And yes, this game has a boss fight. (Not putting who you are fighting due to spoilers) Overall, this game is great. It may be short but it is very challenging.

Premessa: Ho comprato il gioco anni fa, e solo recentemente ho ritrovato la voglia di giocarlo, ma niente da fare.
Visivamente anche dopo tutti questi anni il gioco è una goduria per gli occhi, livelli carini da superare peccato per la difficoltà, troppo easy per i miei gusti.
Lato NEGATIVO che alla fine di tutto è la longevità del gioco, carino ok, ma solo qualche ora di gioco non soddisfa il mio acquisto ma soprattutto la battle boss finale è stata una rottura di maroni.

Buen juego, las texturas y los graficos demasiados anticuados pero la mecánica de Portales esta bastante copada, ojala tenga alguna secuela en el futuro que expanda mas el lore y agregue más y más pruebas.
PD: Estaría copado que tenga un modo online cooperativo donde controles por ejemplo a 2 robots random y nos permita hacer desafíos diferentes al modo historia.

Acabando de terminar el juego, fue mi primer acercamiento a la saga, puedo decir que es un buen juego, tiene mecánicas interesantes, es divertido y los puzzles están bien sin ser nada del otro mundo, pero yo no lo recomendaría porque hoy en día no vale la pena, tiene una campaña corta, solo me tomó 4 horas completarlo pero el problema no es el tiempo, sino que no te dejará nada especial después de completarlo, la trama llega a ser interesante pero no se desarrolla ya que el objetivo son resolver puzzles pero a la vez estos no tienen mayor dificultad por lo que termina siendo un juego en la media, pero su mayor problema es su secuela que es infinitamente mas interesante y si tienes que elegir entre uno de los 2 este no es el indicado.

Claramente no recomiendo su precio completo e Incluso si se encuentra en pack de oferta no pierdes nada si compras solo el 2, solo adquiere este si eres muy fan de la saga o  nostalgia, no hay otra razón

Released in 2007, this game had a very unique concept for its time and the graphics are pretty good. Of course the puzzles will make you think a lot while figuring out the solution. But it doesn't get frustrating and the story keeps the curiosity of the player at an all time high. This game is not very long, however it is very satisfying when completed. This game is truly a masterpiece and I highly recommend the players to try this game before you play portal 2.

Un jeu sympathique malgré sa courte durée de vie.
Si la difficulté n'est pas presente dans la campagne, c'est qu'elle se trouve dans les défis (Vous refaite des maps avec des contraintes), car pour réussir et accéder à la médaille d'or qui est impossible à obtenir pour un être humain, il faut des connaissances en speedrun et en exploitation de bug.
Mais à part ça même si j'ai détruit un clavier sur ses défis pour le 100%, j'apprécie beaucoup ce jeu et le recommande malgré tout.
An absolute classic!

Toujours aussi bon ce jeu, court mais tellement fun, un des jeux de puzzle qui a su le mieux joindre un bon scénario et des salles d'énigmes, tout est juste iconique dans Portal. 

P.S. : Si vous voulez plus de contenu, le workshop est là pour vous.

The simple premise makes for a lot of very fun puzzles. I've hear this game referenced all the time but now I've actually played it and it holds up. However, canada was reaching peak temperature when I played so I was sweating the whole time. Definitely would recommend.

Highly recommend, i played a tiny bit of it on my xbox a few years ago, but because of the sale, i had to pick it up for pc, an i loved it, the puzzles are very creative, but not too difficult or too easy. There are the advanced maps as well witch change up the cambers in a way that makes you think of it completely ifferentially. Finally there are the challenges that make you finish the normal chambers in different ways. If you like achievement hunting, this is a great game for it, there are 15 achievements that are not all too difficult, i managed to do it all in 13 hours. if you like puzzles, good writing, or achievement hunting, this is a great game

This was a fun, unique, and challenging single player experience.  Although the game is very linear, there were so many times in the last few sections that I was surprised to see how the game ramps up the pressure while keeping me mentally engaged. This can be a helpful primer for anyone who needs basic experience with FPS on mouse and keyboard.
amazing puzzle game
good

[h1]PORTAL É UM JOGO QUE TE ENTREGA MAIS DO QUE VOCÊ ESPERA[/h1]

- Em [b]Portal[/b] você é colocado para fazer uma série de testes em prol de um laboratório de tecnologia; [spoiler]porém com o desenrolar do jogo, ele te entrega diversas pistas que nada é o que parece ser.[/spoiler] Quando fui joga-lo não esperava que o jogo fosse ter uma história em si, acreditava que era só mais um jogo casual, que tinha idéias muito inteligentes para fazer puzzles desafiadores, mas havia muito mais por trás disso.

- No quesito gameplay este jogo é sensacional, ótimas mecânicas que deixam o jogo ainda mais especial e desafiador, e mesmo que sejam mecânicas simples, são o suficiente para fazer você pensar bem como passar de cada sala. 

- Esse talvez possa ter sido também uma das coisas que mais me impressionou durante a jogatina, como pode um jogo de 2007 ter gráficos tão bonitos??? É incrível que tenha passado mais de uma década e o visual do jogo continue agradando tanto; é uma coisa ou outra que você vai notar que não pareceu ""realista"", mas o que você espera de efeitos em um jogo de 14 anos atrás? E isso que impressiona também, a física que envolve os portais no jogo é sensacional, te abre diversas janelas de possibilidades e é utilizada com maestria nesse jogo.

- A trilha sonora e o áudio no jogo são simples, mas bons o suficiente para não deixarem a desejar; mas o principal ponto positivo para mim são as vozes dos personagens em diálogos, principalmente dos robôs militares que com certeza vão te tirar uma risadinha.

Вся серия игр Portal РЕКОМЕНДУЕТСЯ К ПРОХОЖДЕНИЮ

Portal is an interesting experiment with very few shards of its plot scattered around; the portal mechanics are still impressive, the game's plain, ominous design for its chambers still invoke a sense of dread upon the player, but while it works as an experiment, it doesn't work as a full priced game. The concept is very strong, but it's not enough to carry the full game.
The levels are all too short. While some may leave you thinking for a few minutes, that's all they'll do. When you figure out how they work, it does grant you a feeling of success and self-improvement, but you won't really get the urge to play them again unless you really care about your time or if you're a speedrunner. And while I do enjoy some slight speedrunning every once in a while, Portal didn't give me that need to improve upon my previous times. It started, I played it, and then it ended. There are very few new mechanics introduced as you go along, with some (like the [spoiler]rocket turrets[/spoiler]) showing up far too late into the game. Not having both portals since the beginning feels like a tease, but I feel like this was just a big wasted opportunity. With both portals, you could make many early levels replayable or more interesting, but they just feel like drawn-out tutorials for the basic game mechanics.
The only content you get outside the main chambers are six "advanced" chambers, which are just a little more annoying due to certain changes in the levels. The challenges (least portals, least amount of time, etc.) aren't interesting enough for me to obsess over, either.
I'd be lying if I said the game wasn't interesting, but I don't recommend anyone buying this game if it's not on sale. Luckily, it currently is, and you can even buy it alongside Portal 2 in a "complete package". The lack of support post-launch really hurts this game's longevity.

This was a triumph!
I'm making a note here:
"HUGE SUCCESS!!"
It's hard to overstate
My satisfaction.
Aperture Science;
We do what we must,
Because we can.
For the good of all of us.
Except the ones who are dead.
But there's no sense crying
Over every mistake.
You just keep on trying
Till you run out of cake.
And the science gets done,
And you make a neat gun
For the people who are
Still alive.
I'm not even angry...
I'm being so sincere right now -
Even though you broke my heart,
And killed me.
And tore me to pieces.
And threw every piece into a fire.
As they burned it hurt because
I was so happy for you!
Now, these points of data
Make a beautiful line.
And we're out of BETA.
We're releasing on time!
So I'm GLaD, I got burned
Think of all the things we learned
For the people who are
Still alive.
(Maybe you'll find someone else
To help you?)
Maybe Black Mesa?
That was a joke! HAHA!! FAT CHANCE!!
Anyway this cake is great!
It's so delicious and moist!
Look at me, still talking
When there's science to do!
When I look out there,
It makes me glad I'm not you.
I've experiments to run.
There is research to be done,
On the people who are
Still alive
And believe me I am
Still alive
I'm doing science and I'm
Still alive
I feel fantastic and I'm
Still alive
While you're dying I'll be
Still alive.
And when you're dead I will be
Still alive
Still alive
Still alive

Un juegazo, sin lugar a dudas, como todos los desarrollados por Valve.

- Si quieres un juego ENTRETENIDO pero DESAFIANTE -> ES TU JUEGO

- Si quieres un juego que te permita REJUGARLO con NUEVOS RETOS -> ES TU JUEGO

- Si eres un jugador "hardcore" también tienes DESAFÍOS MUY DIFÍCILES -> ES TU JUEGO

- Si quieres un JUEGAZO BARATO -> ES TU JUEGO
